snippet: A Mediterranean island is in search of wealthy foreigners with the means to buy citizenship and bring the government some cash.
abstract: Island nation of Malta is selling citizenship for 1.15 million euros, or $1.55 million; move is motivated in part by economic stress, and in part by what some call crass opportunism.
lead_paragraph: A Mediterranean island is in search of wealthy foreigners with the means to buy citizenship and bring the government some cash.

headline.main: Give Malta Your Tired and Huddled, and Rich
headline.print_headline: Give Malta Your Tired and Huddled, and Rich
